TransactionStateContext.StakingState: When users deposit pandas to the contract via various transfer and siring functions.
TransactionStateContext.AuctionState: When pandas are placed for auction through createAuction and related auction functions.
TransactionStateContext.BreedingState: When pandas are in gestation period or set to be bred.

ExternalInteractions: ERC721 transfers occur through _transfer function to transfer pandas between contract and users during auction or other exchanges.
GeneScienceInterface is used to interact with genetic functions, such as gene mixing in breeding.
